ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Fujifilm X-A1 Digital Camera & 16-50mm XC Lens (Black) + <2> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <3> Spare NP-W126 Battery +
<4> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <5> PD 50" Compact Travel Tripod + <6> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case +
<7> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <8> PD 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <9> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <12> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm X-A1 Digital Camera & 16-50mm XC Lens (Black) with 32GB Card + Flash + Battery + Case + Filter + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses Kit
